mining.upgradeDescription: This is your first mining rig that you built in your garage. Boost its power to kickstart your mining journey.

specials.upgradeDescription: Your dedication has earned you this CEX.IO Power. Use these early adopter gains to get ahead!
Reward yourself with a private beach house. Experience ultimate relaxation.
